content: दंडकः {@--1@} A stick, staff &c. {@--2@} A line, row. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a metre; see App. I. --कः, --का, --कं <ab>N.</ab> of a celebrated district in the Deccan situated between the rivers Narmadā and Godāvarī; (it was a vast region said to be tenantless in the time of Rāma); प्राप्तानि दुःखान्यपि दंडकेषु <ls>R. 14. 25</ls>; किं नाम दंडकेयं <ls>U. 2</ls>; क्वायोध्यायाः पुनरुपगमो दंडकायां वने वः <ls>U. 2. 13</ls>, <ls n="U. 2.">14</ls>, <ls n="U. 2.">15.</ls>
